alert.note: Alert for Bell; Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 10:01PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harlan and southern Bell Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 1001 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ferndale, or near Pineville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Miracle and Callaway around 1005 PM EDT. Cubage, Oaks, Balkan and Black Snake around 1010 PM EDT. Pathfork around 1015 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hensley Store, Liggett, Peepace Store and Martins Fork. THIS INCLUDES U.S. Highway 25 East in Bell County between mile markers 4 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
